titleStmt.title: A discourse of the state ecclesiasticall of this kingdome, in relation to the civill Considered vnder three conclusions. With a digression discussing some ordinary exceptions against ecclesiasticall officers. By C.D.
titleStmt.author: Downing, Calubyte, 1606-1644.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
